nav.div: Hamburg Central School District » News » What's New » Accessibility to meals

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled Accessibility to meals

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
div.span: Hamburg Central School District will continue meal service during this extended school closure on Mondays and Wednesdays at the High School location only. Adults can pick up meals between 4:30 - 6:00p.m. at the front doors of the High School. If you do not have a vehicle during this time, please contact Anne Rich at arich@hcsdk12.org for delivery.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

strong.span: Click link, or copy and paste, to fill out Meal Request Form:

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

div.span: One breakfast and one lunch will be provided for each child in your household, age 18 and under, per your request. (
Mondays you will receive 2 days meals and Wednesdays, 3 days meals.)

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small;

span.br: The district will communicate any changes as they occur.
